# MusicLibrary

**Class**

An object your app uses to access the user’s music library.

## Declaration

```swift
class MusicLibrary
```

## Instance Methods

- **add(_:)**: Adds an item to the user’s music library.
- **add(_:to:)**: Adds an item to the end of an existing playlist.
- **createPlaylist(name:description:authorDisplayName:)**: Creates a playlist in the user’s music library.
- **createPlaylist(name:description:authorDisplayName:items:)**: Creates a playlist in the user’s music library.
- **edit(_:name:description:authorDisplayName:)**: Edits a playlist that your app has created.
- **edit(_:name:description:authorDisplayName:items:)**: Edits a playlist that your app has created including items to rebuild the list of entries.

## Type Properties

- **shared**: A shared object that allows your app to modify the user’s music library.

## Enumerations

- **MusicLibrary.Error**: An error that the music library can throw upon accessing, manipulating, or requesting data from the user’s music library.
